title: Free but proly unintended IP refund
body:
Not that I'm complaining, but I HAD a little over 12600 IP, bought Zac AND a rune page with IP, and the next day I STILL have Zac, the new rune page, AND a little over 6300 IP. Ch-ching!

I tried submitting a ticket, but the Technical Feedback subheading in the in-game Help section seems like the directions might need to be updated. 

SO, I logged in with my NA account and started a Technical Support chat but for some reason I got Brazil region Tech Support lol and I don't speak Spanish.

ANYWAY, hopefully if it even matters somebody sees this; I tried, I'm sure it'll sort itself out. I'll resist the OVERWHELMING urge to abscond with the offending IP.
